no.kartverket.positionorientation

Class Transform.PointInTerrainObservation

  • java.lang.Object
    • no.kartverket.positionorientation.Transform.PointInTerrainObservation
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Transform.Observation
    Enclosing class:
    Transform

    public class Transform.PointInTerrainObservation
extends java.lang.Object
implements Transform.Observation
    observation of a tango point that should lie on a terrain model surface

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description

    • Field Detail

      • x_t

        float x_t
        x coordinate for tango position

      • z_t

        float z_t
        z coordinate for tango position

      • sd

        float sd
        a priori standard deviation of distance between surface and point

      • v

        float v
        a posteriori estimate of residual (distance between surface and point)

      • v_sd

        float v_sd
        a posteriori estimate of standard deviation of residual

      • plane

        float[] plane
        A plane equation in world coordinates for the closest facet of the terrain surface to this point. Points with coordinates x, y, z in the plane should satisfy the equation x*plane[0] + y*plane[1] + z*plane[2] == plane[3] and the 3 dimensional vector [plane[0], plane[1], plane[2]] should be normalized to unity

      • grid

        DTMGrid grid
        A surface model describing the terrain. The surface grid should be able to find the plane equation of the closest facet to a point in world coordinates using the method DTMGrid.getSurfacePlane(float, float, float).
